select.foreach: SELECT P.PLACE_NAME AS PLACE_NAME , B.BENEFIT_SEQ AS BENEFIT_SEQ , B.CARD_SEQ AS CARD_SEQ , B.CARD_SALE AS CARD_SALE , MAX(B.CARD_PRICE) AS CARD_PRICE , #{item.cardPrice} AS CARD_MONEY_VALUE FROM t_card_benefit B JOIN t_place_mst P ON P.PLACE_MST_SEQ = B.PLACE_MST_SEQ WHERE B.BENEFIT_STATE = 'Y' AND P.PLACE_NAME = #{item.placeName} AND B.CARD_PRICE <= #{item.cardPrice} GROUP BY(CARD_SEQ)
